author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam loves the idea of giant LEGO sculptures, and 3D printing has made supersized versions of his favorite LEGO sets possible. 3D designer and toy creator Stian Ervik Wahlvåg sends Adam one of his giant LEGO creations: a space shuttle inspired by one in the LEGO Ideas 21312 Women of NASA set! It's a microscale shuttle reimagined in massive scale!

Find Stian's 3D print projects and videos here: https://www.youtube.com/@agepbiz/videos https://www.instagram.com/agepbiz/ and https://www.thingiverse.com/agepbiz/designs
Matt Denton's Giant LEGO bike: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mVzafoKXynU

Shot by Adam Savage and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Adam Savage Assembles a Giant LEGO Space Shuttle!
